examples: Your birthday is the same as the day you were born.

meanings.definition: A person who makes a particular thing.
examples: Some people say that Leonardo daVinci was the inventor of human flight, because he drew designs for flying machines hundreds of years ago.

meanings.definition: A person with an unusual ability to think or create in ways that go far beyond what most people can do.
examples: The first book he wrote was so good, it shows a genius at work.

meanings.definition: To mention or call attention to.
examples: She referred to her good friends when she thanked everyone for their support.
